title: Spicy Chicken Biryani
description: A mouth-watering blend of aromatic basmati rice, tender chicken, and a medley of spices. This one-pot wonder is a feast for the senses.
makingProcess: Marinate chicken in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook on low heat until rice is tender.

title: Savory Beef Biryani
description: A rich and flavorful dish featuring succulent beef, fragrant basmati rice, and a symphony of spices. A true celebration of South Asian cuisine.
makingProcess: Marinate beef in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Slow-cook until the meat is tender and the flavors meld.

title: Classic Mutton Biryani
description: An iconic dish featuring succulent mutton, fragrant basmati rice, and a melange of spices. This biryani is a true testament to culinary perfection.
makingProcess: Marinate mutton in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Slow-cook until the meat is tender and the flavors meld.

title: Flavorful Vegetable Biryani
description: A delightful vegetarian option with a medley of colorful vegetables, fragrant basmati rice, and aromatic spices. A feast for both the eyes and the palate.
makingProcess: Mix vegetables with yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the rice is tender. A vibrant and tasty vegetarian treat!

title: Spicy Fish Biryani
description: An aromatic blend of marinated fish, fragrant basmati rice, and a mix of spices. This seafood delight brings the flavors of the ocean to your plate.
makingProcess: Marinate fish in yogurt and fish biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the fish is cooked through and the rice is tender.

title: Flavor-packed Egg Biryani
description: A delectable fusion of hard-boiled eggs, fragrant basmati rice, and a mix of spices. This biryani is a hearty and satisfying option for egg lovers.
makingProcess: Layer hard-boiled eggs with marinated rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the rice is tender. A protein-packed and flavorful choice for egg enthusiasts!

title: Hyderabadi Dum Biryani
description: A regal dish with fragrant basmati rice, marinated meat, and aromatic spices, slow-cooked to perfection. A culinary masterpiece inspired by the city of Nizams.
makingProcess: Marinate meat in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Slow-cook to perfection using the dum method for an authentic Hyderabadi experience.

title: Flavorful Kofta Biryani
description: A delightful fusion of spiced kofta (meatballs), fragrant basmati rice, and aromatic spices. This biryani is a celebration of textures and flavors.
makingProcess: Layer spiced kofta with marinated rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the rice is tender. A delightful and savory twist to the traditional biryani.

title: Paneer Paradise Biryani
description: An exquisite vegetarian delight featuring succulent paneer, fragrant basmati rice, and a blend of aromatic spices. A celebration of flavors for paneer lovers.
makingProcess: Marinate paneer in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the rice is tender. A vegetarian paradise on your plate!

title: Sizzling Shrimp Biryani
description: A seafood sensation with plump shrimp, fragrant basmati rice, and a melody of spices. This biryani brings the flavors of the ocean to your dining table.
makingProcess: Marinate shrimp in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the shrimp is cooked through and the rice is tender.

title: Savory Keema Biryani
description: A hearty dish featuring spiced minced meat, fragrant basmati rice, and a symphony of aromatic spices. A perfect comfort food for meat lovers.
makingProcess: Saut√© spiced minced meat, layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Cook until the meat is cooked through and the rice is tender. A flavorful meaty delight!

title: Royal Lamb Biryani
description: A regal dish featuring succulent lamb, fragrant basmati rice, and a blend of aromatic spices. This biryani is fit for a king's feast.
makingProcess: Marinate lamb in yogurt and biryani masala. Layer with partially cooked rice, fried onions, and herbs. Slow-cook until the meat is tender and the flavors meld. Fit for royalty!
